ThingDef.label: Steel Heart Casing
ThingDef.description:
Latest advancements in modern medicine, and pressure from local military, have lead to the production of a heart casing.
This casing might seem like an idea created by a soon-to-be fired doctor, because it probably was, but this questionable advancement in body augmentation has lead to a sturdy, battle tested casing.
Now Picard can fulfill his dreams.

ThingDef.label: Plasteel Heart Casing
ThingDef.description:
The now dismissed doctor, now ignoring the ethics committee's warnings, chose to continue his research. The doctor's first iteration of the casing, now recalled, was indeed flawed. The test subjects unexpectedly died due to heart failure, but the doctor persisted.
This new and improved casing is now more flexible than the last, while still sporting its same protective qualities.
Now Picard can fulfill his dreams.

ThingDef.label: Plasteel Liver Casing
ThingDef.description:
The now dismissed doctor, now ignoring the ethics committee's warnings, chose to continue his research. The doctor's first iteration of the casing, now recalled, was indeed flawed. The test subjects unexpectedly died due to the casing gradually being corroded by their bodies, but the doctor persisted.
This new and improved casing is now more bio-compatible than the last, while still sporting its same protective qualities.
Now Picard can fulfill his dreams.

ThingDef.label: Plasteel Eye Casing
ThingDef.description:
The now dismissed doctor, now ignoring the ethics committee's warnings, chose to continue his research. The doctor's first iteration of the casing, now recalled, was indeed flawed. The test subjects reportedly had vision loss immediately after the casing was installed, but their demands for the all-encompassing casing to be removed were dismissed. Perhaps this doctor shouldn't be allowed near people...
Fortunately, the ethics committee threatened to cut the mad doctor's funding unless the doctor made the next casing with an opening for light to pass through.
Now Picard can fulfill his dreams.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Bionic Heart
ThingDef.description: The doctor, reportedly surviving a mechanoid raid, had an outlandish idea. What if they combined their technology with the doctor's casings?

ThingDef.label: Bionic Lung
ThingDef.description:
The doctor, reportedly surviving a mechanoid raid, had an outlandish idea. What if they combined their technology with the doctor's casings?
This would've been a simpler feat had a bionic lung already existed. The mad doctor sought the help of the world's most talented engineers to develop a prototype. They all criticized the doctor for even attempting something so questionable.
"Merging human and machine into one? Only a fool would do such a thing" they shouted as they walked away.
